original: Naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṁ
analyzed: ▁na an upādinn aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an upādinn o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁na an upādinn aṃ

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
naupādinno ca naanupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
Naupādinnañca naanupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁na upādinn añca ▁na an upādinn añca ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na upādinn o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
